item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Sunday, January 26, 2025 at 10:15 AM UTC
item.description:

26. How far can you get in 40 minutes from each subway station in NYC? (273 points | 163 comments)
27. Ask HN: How to automate collecting HAR file while user is browsing (5 points | 4 comments)
28. Immutability Changes Everything (2016) [pdf] (87 points | 28 comments)
29. Fault Tolerance in Tandem Computer Systems (1986) [pdf] (44 points | 25 comments)
30. CIA now favors lab leak theory to explain Covid's origins (450 points | 553 comments)
